titles.title: Timucuan Ecological and Historic Preserve Boundary Revision Act of 2003
A bill to expand the Timucuan Ecological and Historic Preserve, Florida.
Timucuan Ecological and Historic Preserve Boundary Revision Act of 2003

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on National Parks. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 108-626.

bill.summary: Timucuan Ecological and Historic Preserve Boundary Revision Act of 2003 - Modifies the boundaries of the Timucuan Ecological and Historic Preserve to incorporate additional acreage located in Nassau County, Florida. Requires the Secretary of the Interior to revise Preserve boundaries and maintain a map of the additional acreage for public inspection in the appropriate offices of the National Park Service.
